quote: A podcast is way easier to start because it's just audio. I can just get a business owner on the other side of the mic and ask them questions.
why_clipworthy: Shows a practical approach to starting a podcast for community engagement.
suggested_hook: Want to connect with your community and grow your real estate business? Start a podcast!

quote: It takes a lot of time to reprogram your brain. You have to be consistent with practices like gratitude and affirmations.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of consistent personal development for overcoming mental barriers.
suggested_hook: Struggling with limiting beliefs? Here's how to reprogram your mindset for success.
